casebody.data:
STATE EX REL. BENDER
v.
FRANKLIN CTY. BD. OF ELECTIONS 2019-0767 Supreme Court of Ohio. June 18, 2019

CASE ANNOUNCEMENT

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULING

In Mandamus. On relator's motion for expedited consideration. Motion granted. Respondent shall file an answer to the complaint within five days, and this cause shall proceed as an expedited election case pursuant to S.Ct.Prac.R. 12.08. No requests or stipulations for extension of time shall be filed, and the clerk shall refuse to file any requests or stipulations for extension of time. All filed documents shall be served as specified by S.Ct.Prac.R. 12.08(C).
